parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. You can call the ListApplication operation to query the application ID. For more information, see [ListApplication](~~149390~~).

parameters.name: Replicas
parameters.description: The expected number of application instances after the scale-out or scale-in. The minimum number is 0.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: The timeout period of the change process. Unit: seconds.
